ygData.subject: Re: Lowest price possible on medium steel
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m pretty sure you won t be too happy about this when you look more closely at it... Kelethin sells MEDIUM plate (and chain and leather and banded molds)
ygData.messageBody:
Llewrend Lynnhaven wrote:

> From: Llewrend Lynnhaven <lordartos@...>
>
> Well, I went out and bought my steele breastplate this
> weekend. I had a charisma of 118 and bought it from
> Kelethin, my home city, I got it for about 757pp. My
> ranger friend checked what his price would be just to
> see, and it was over 900 for him. Also I noticed that
> it isn't size specific. No medium or large to it.
> Pretty cool, eh?

I'm pretty sure you won't be too happy about this when you look more closely
at it... Kelethin sells MEDIUM plate (and chain and leather and banded
molds) for some reason. Wood elves can wear medium, but they SHOULD wear
small. For small plate, you have to buy in Rivervale or Kaladim or Akanon.
If you check the races that can wear the plate, I think you'll find it's the
medium races.

Unless there has been a wonderful change lately.

Jyzan
